Uses of Class
de.hshl.obj.loader.OBJLoader

  • Packages that use OBJLoader 
    Package Description
    de.hshl.obj.loader
    Provides a simple API for the core functionality of this library.

    • Uses of OBJLoader in de.hshl.obj.loader

      Methods in de.hshl.obj.loader that return OBJLoader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OBJLoader OBJLoader.setGenerateIndexedMeshes(boolean indexing)
      Decide whether the loaded meshes should be converted to indexed vertex data or only vertex arrays.
      OBJLoader OBJLoader.setIgnoreThirdTextureCoordinate(boolean ignore)
      Decide whether the third texture coordinate should be allowed and ignored.
      OBJLoader OBJLoader.setLoadedStructureKind(OBJLoader.StructureKind kind)
      Decide which kind of structure should be loaded from the OBJ file: Either OBJLoader.StructureKind.Objects or OBJLoader.StructureKind.Groups.
      OBJLoader OBJLoader.setLoadNormals(boolean enabled)
      Decide whether vertex normals should be loaded.
      OBJLoader OBJLoader.setLoadTextureCoordinates(boolean enabled)
      Decide whether texture coordinates should be loaded.
      OBJLoader OBJLoader.setPrintWarnings(boolean visible)
      Decide whether to print messages for unsupported features.
      OBJLoader OBJLoader.setTriangulator(Triangulator triangulator)
      Specify how to triangulate n-gons.
